original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role is a strategic blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, requiring the ability to deeply understand complex business processes and seamlessly translate them into effective system configurations. As a key player, you will ensure our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at peak efficiency. This position will focus heavily on developing new, innovative processes leveraging technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, utilizing cutting-edge Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to rapidly develop tailored solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across departments to thoroughly understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using a variety of techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate comprehensive business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the implementation of industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet all requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to tackle complex challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, with the proven ability to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Strong business acumen and the capacity to deeply understand and map complex business processes
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with the ability to leverage these skills to develop and maintain effective system configurations

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) techniques and their practical implementation
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Specialized knowledge and experience within the vehicle configuration domain

Required Experience:
- Demonstrable experience in implementing and managing ML-driven solutions in a production environment

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Proven track record of successful vehicle configuration system implementations

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in utilizing a variety of data querying, reporting, and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)

This role presents a unique opportunity to blend your exceptional business acumen with advanced technical expertise, serving as a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at peak efficiency. As a Configuration Specialist, you will be responsible for translating complex business processes into effective system configurations, with a particular focus on driving innovation within the vehicle configuration space through the strategic application of Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their unique business requirements, gathering detailed information and documenting it using a variety of techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Leverage your strong technical proficiency to translate comprehensive business requirements into robust, scalable configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving any configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, utilizing advanced database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover valuable insights
- Proactively identify and propose innovative solutions to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency, leveraging your expertise in configuration changes and industry best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet all requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) and providing detailed feedback
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to tackle complex challenges and devise creative solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, with the proven ability to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Robust business acumen and the capacity to deeply understand and map complex business processes
- Proficiency in Java and SQL, with the ability to leverage these skills to develop and maintain effective system configurations
- Familiarity with Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) techniques and their practical application

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with the implementation and management of ML-driven solutions in a production environment
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Specialized knowledge and experience within the vehicle configuration domain

Required Experience:
- Demonstrable experience in implementing and managing ML-driven solutions in a production environment
- Proven track record of successfully translating business requirements into technical configurations within complex enterprise systems

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working with Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Successful track record of vehicle configuration system implementations

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in utilizing a variety of data querying, reporting, and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and project management tools (e.g., Jira, Trello)
